Audio.Locality: Reserva Ecológica de Guapi Açu (REGUA), RJ
Audio.Author: Eric DeFonso
Audio.Comments: Extended cut of natural song, given in occasional strophes. A fair amount of stream noise - signal does improve into the cut. Break halfway through was for about a minute. Recorded from the Green Trail that heads into the higher hills of the reserve.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:no
